summary: Requiem 1.8.x patch for Guard Dialogue Overhaul by Eckss
descriptionHtml:
Requiem 1.8.x patch for Guard Dialogue Overhaul by Eckss

Armors and weapons have been adjusted to match Requiem's values.


[u]Compatibility[/u]
Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade + Clothing and Clutter Fixes + All DLC option available.


[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - Guard Dialogue Overhaul.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - Guard Dialogue Overhaul.esp after Requiem and Guard Dialogue Overhaul and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
Guard Dialogue Overhaul.esp
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem - Guard Dialogue Overhaul.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp                    <--- if you use Wrye Bash
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp


[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23390/?]Guard Dialogue Overhaul[/url]: Eckss
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?]Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade[/url]: [b]kryptopyr[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43053/?]Clothing and Clutter Fixes[/url]:[b] kryptopyr[/b]
author: spikyfishy

files.name: Requiem - Guard Dialogue Overhaul
files.changelogHtml: Weapons and Armor Fixes Remade + Clothing and Clutter Fixes option added.
